member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Layout.ContentAlignment
member.summary: Describes the alignment of the content of layout element.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Layout.ContentAlignment.TopLeft
member.summary: Top left alignment.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Layout.ContentAlignment.TopCenter
member.summary: Top centered alignment.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Layout.ContentAlignment.TopRight
member.summary: Top right alignment.

member.summary: Middle left alignment.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Layout.ContentAlignment.MiddleCenter
member.summary: Middle centered alignment.

member.summary: Middle right alignment.

member.summary: Bottom left alignment.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Layout.ContentAlignment.BottomCenter
member.summary: Bottom centered alignment.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.AnnotationMarkerDeleteBehavior
member.summary: Describes the behavior of an annotation in case of delete operation.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.AnnotationMarkerDeleteBehavior.PreserveAnnotation
member.summary: Preserves the annotation, but the content can be modified. Can be used for Backspace and DeleteBehavior.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.AnnotationMarkerDeleteBehavior.PreserveAnnotationContent
member.summary: Deprecated. Preserves the annotation and its content from modifications and deleting. Can be used for DeleteSelectedBehavior.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.AnnotationMarkerDeleteBehavior.SelectAnnotation
member.summary: Selects the annotation. Can be used for Backspace and DeleteBehavior.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.AnnotationMarkerDeleteBehavior.RemoveAnnotation
member.summary: Removes the annotation, but leaves its content. Can be used for Backspace, Delete and DeleteSelectedBehavior.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.AnnotationMarkerDeleteBehavior.SelectAnnotationMarker
member.summary: Selects the annotation marker. Can be used for Backspace and DeleteBehavior.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.BaselineAlignment
member.summary: Describes how the baseline for a text-based element is positioned on the vertical axis, relative to the established baseline for text.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.BaselineAlignment.Baseline
member.summary: A baseline that is aligned at the actual baseline of the containing box.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.BaselineAlignment.Subscript
member.summary: A baseline that is aligned at the subscript position of the containing box.

member.name: F:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.BaselineAlignment.Superscript
member.summary: A baseline that is aligned at the superscript position of the containing box.

member.name: T:Telerik.Windows.Documents.Model.IReadOnlyRangeMarker
member.summary: Indicator interface for annotation markers denoting read-only ranges.
